description: This file is a React-like component written in TypeScript with JSX syntax, using the Qwik framework. It defines a UI component that renders a flower generator with animated state and styles, and exports page head metadata.

methods.name: component$
methods.description: Defines the main Qwik component rendering the flower generator.

methods.name: useStylesScoped$
methods.description: Applies scoped CSS styles to the component.

methods.name: useLocation
methods.description: Provides access to the current URL location for dynamic parameter handling.

methods.name: useVisibleTask$
methods.description: Runs side effects when the component becomes visible, including setting timers.
